name: Fidget Spinner In Space
description: Fly for a spinner in space, avoid asteroids and the UFO police, and collect heads of aliens flying in space
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
